scenario.name: Call Scenario
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:1001@18.228.226.57:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:1000@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1001@18.228.226.57> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:1000@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=SIP Call c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 6000 RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:1001@18.228.226.57:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:1000@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1001@18.228.226.57> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:1000@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:1001@18.228.226.57:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:1000@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1001@18.228.226.57> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Content-Length: 0
